attributes.action: stick to the principal of choices that you adhere to and let people choose if they wish to pay the 50p tax on landlines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: having written about the 50p landline tax to mrs a cryer, my local mp, her reply was that she had to wait for a follow up reply from a mr timmins regarding the 50p tax on landlines which never came. no doubt he has failed to give her a response for me to have as it would be awkward for her to let me know that we are all being bullied into paying it. It's time the public had a call-line to deal with bullying tactics by politicians.Why should so many people around here find it atrocious that this tax is going to be levied ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
